entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -11.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Big Trout Lake Airport 2:56 PM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

Temperature: -11.1°C
Pressure: 101.6 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 88 %
Dewpoint: -12.7°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Fog patches dissipating early in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.summary: Clearing. High minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023
